GPT_instructions: Given the input resume of a candidate to a role of a %%role_title%%, output the number of years of experience the candidate has got in the specific given role. Note the the current date is %%current_date%%. Output format: "{\"Experience\": HOW_MANY_YEARS_OF_EXPERIENCE}".
GPT_instructions_2: Given the input resume of a candidate to a role of a %%role_title%%, output the following python dictionary format, containing the correct values as described here: "{\"Experience\": HOW_MANY_YEARS_OF_RELEVANT_EXPERIENCE}". Note the the current date is %%current_date%%.
